name: create-evergreen-app
description: A starter project for getting up and running with an evergreen web application development stack.
author: Owen Buckley <owen@thegreenhouse.io>

scripts.gh-pages: rimraf ./docs && cd ./template && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../ && cp -rv ./template/public/ ./docs
scripts.test:template: cd template && npm i && export NODE_ENV=production && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.test:template-backup: export NODE_ENV=production && npm i --prefix template && npm test --prefix template && npm run lint --prefix template && npm run build --prefix template
